sourcesContent:
const createUser = require('./user').createUser
const events = require('./event').events
const createEvent = require('./event').createEvent
console.log(createUser)

const resolvers = {
  createUser,
  events,
  createEvent,
}

module.exports = resolvers

const userType = `
type User {
    _id: ID!
    email: String!
    password: String
    createdEvents: [${eventType}!]
}`

const eventType = `
type Event {
    _id: ID!
    title: String!
    description: String!
    price: Float!
    date: String!
    creator: ${userType}!
  }`

exports.eventType = eventType
exports.userType = userType

const User = require('./userType')

const eventType = `
type Event {
    _id: ID!
    title: String!
    description: String!
    price: Float!
    date: String!
    creator: ${User}!
  }`

module.exports = eventType
module.eventType = eventType

const userType = `
type User {
    _id: ID!
    email: String!
    password: String
    createdEvents: [${eventType}!]
}`

const eventType = `
type Event {
    _id: ID!
    title: String!
    description: String!
    price: Float!
    date: String!
    creator: ${userType}!
  }`

module.eventType = eventType
module.userType = userType

const eventInput = `
input EventInput {
    title: String!
    description: String!
    price: Float!
    date: String!
  }`

module.exports = eventInput

const userInput = `
input UserInput {
    email: String!
    password: String!
  }
`
module.exports = userInput
exports.dateToString = (date) => new Date(date).toISOString()
